div.head: 狐尿刺瘡
div.div: sores resulting from being pierced by fox urine

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: sores resulting from being pierced by fox urine

sense.def: Alternative Names hu niao ci 狐尿刺 , fox urine piercing; hu ci chuang 狐刺瘡 , sores resulting from fox piercing; ci chuang 刺瘡 , piercing sores; hu niao chuang 狐尿瘡 , sores resulting from fox urine; hu ci niao chuang 狐刺尿瘡 , sores resulting from the piercing urine of foxes. Pathological Condition Combined Designation of chuang 瘡 , sores, conditions resulting from touching poisonous substances left on herbs and trees by all types of poisonous bugs/snakes/insects. Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry lu feng fang 露峰房：水煮，洗狐尿刺瘡 , “Boil in water and use to wash sores resulting from being pierced by fox urine ”.
